Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: In the world of social media people have been fiercely vocalizing their concerns ahead of the upcoming federal budget. A committee tasked with investigating the jobseeker rate is calling for a substantial increase urging the government to provide much-needed support. General practitioners are demanding changes to help more Australians afford healthcare. Meanwhile the tough economic climate is expected to continue and demands for increased funding to prevent homelessness are being made. People are disgruntled with the Labor party's decision not to increase the jobseeker rate and some language used to express these emotions has been considered inappropriate.
